contentList.content: Bloodvine
An old suit of... armor? It looks like a crab carapace. It's definitely been lost for a while, as vines have made their winding way through its crevices.
Bloodvine: Inception

An old suit of... armor? It looks like a crab carapace. It's definitely been lost for a while, as vines have made their winding way through its crevices- and they're starting to highlight your curves.
Bloodvine: Foundation
An old suit of... armor? It looks like a crab carapace. The vines are thriving with how much blood you've spilled, and so, apparently, are your curves.
Bloodvine: Maturation
An old suit of... armor? It looks like a crab carapace. The vines thrum with ecstacy, and it's clear your body has responded by mirroring their sinous sensuality in supple seductiveness.
Bloodvine: Perfection
An old suit of... armor? It looks like a crab carapace. Enthralled with the virility of your violence, your visage is becoming vivacious and revitalized.
Sapping Vine

You whip up to [1] entities within 12m. You gain the effects of <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="KHB_Sapping_Vine">Target Sapped</LSTag> for each unique enemy, and deal Necrotic Damage equal to twice your <LSTag Tooltip="ProficiencyBonus">Proficiency Bonus</LSTag> plus your Charisma modifier.
Target Sapped
You regain hit points equal to your <LSTag Tooltip="ProficiencyBonus">Proficiency Bonus</LSTag>.
Necrotic Piercing
Your attacks now ignore <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistance</LSTag> to Necrotic damage.
Your attacks now ignore <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistance</LSTag> and <LSTag Tooltip="Immune">Immunity</LSTag> to Necrotic damage.
Bine Bastion
Your v(e)iny carapace reduces all incoming damage by half your <LSTag Tooltip="ProficiencyBonus">Proficiency Bonus</LSTag>.
Your v(e)iny carapace reduces all incoming damage by your <LSTag Tooltip="ProficiencyBonus">Proficiency Bonus</LSTag>.
Box 'O Seeds
Just a rusty, dusty box with lusty, busty seeds...
